Articles.Content:
Greetings fellow Kerbanauts! A friend showed me this game and Ive been having a ball with it for the last week! Its great seeing this board and seeing some really cool shp designs!

So far ive been able to get to the Mun (using mechjeb took some figuring how to work everything), and am working on building large ships that can get into a stable high orbit! Trying to think of other things to do as well.

Just wanted to say hello to the board.
